title: Void Менеджмент

problems.title: Большие проблемы
texts: Мы команда из финансистов и программистов, которая задала вопрос...

buy_form.liquidity_error: Не хватает ликвидности. Попробуйте купить меньше, либо подождите некоторое время
buy_form.balance_error: Вам не хватает токенов. Ваш баланс
buy_form.settlement_error: Вы не можете взаимодействовать с продуктом во время фазы settlement

analytics.title: Аналитика
analytics.balance_hint: Количество токенов данного продукта в вашем кошельке
analytics.total_locked_value_hint: Общая сумма токенов в контракте данного продукта
analytics.available_tokens_hint: Сколько всего вы можете купить токенов
analytics.liquidity_hint: Доступная ликвидность на бирже где мы покупаем токены

questions.question: How does it work?
questions.answer: Indices allow you to buy many tokens at once without any problems with management or the price of the assets. You just buy and sell tokens here, and each one of them has underlying assets that define the price

questions.question: How to buy/sell?
questions.answer: You need to have buy token for the product(DAI, USDT, USDC) that can be found in the analytics section. We use it to track the price of the index and complete all operations. Once you have it, write the amount and buy your tokens. Then, you will need to wait for an indefinite period of settlement. During that period, we will buy all tokens and distribute the debt. Once there is enough debt, you can retrieve it in a separate operation and get your tokens!

questions.question: What is debt and settlement?
questions.answer: We don't manage underlying tokens right away(blockchain capabilities do not allow that). But, instead, we add debt to the system that indicates that you need to receive some money in the future. If there are enough fees collected, the settlement process will begin. Then, you can get the amount of tokens that we could buy(it can be higher or lower that the amount you requested). But, be careful with the settlement process. IT WILL NOT START UNTIL THERE ARE ENOUGH FEES, AND ALL THE OPERATIONS ARE IRREVERSIBLE. THAT MEANS THAT YOU CAN WAIT FOR A VERY LONG PERIOD TO RECEIVE YOUR TOKENS

questions.question: Why are fees so high?
questions.answer: Fees is the only way for us to buy all the underlying assets. When you buy our indices, the majority of your dollars goes to the underlying assets(BTC, ETH and so on). But, to operate the system, we need to run additional settlement transactions, and that is the main place for your fees. Also, we use them to support the project development.

questions.question: When can I receive my debt?
questions.answer: You may wait for an undefined amount of time to receive your debt. We only run the settlement if there are enough fees collected.

questions.question: Unknown error
questions.answer: There may be some errors that we do not control. For example, the exchange where we buy our underlying assets may experience some problems. You can wait for a little bit, but if the problem does not go away, contact us at info@void.management

questions.question: Are there any guarantees?
questions.answer: We don't have any guarantees. ALL RESPONSIBILITY FALLS ON YOU. THE PROJECT IS ACTIVELY BEING DEVELOPED

buy_product.error_debt_exceeded: Не хватает доступного долга продукта, подождите еще
buy_product.error_product_settlement: Данный продукт находится в фазе settlement. Пожалуйста, попробуйте позднее

observer_error: Продукты не были найдены наблюдателем(попытайтесь переключить сеть)

wallet_connector.no_provider_error: Не найден провайдер(Проверьте заявку на подключение в кошельке)
wallet_connector.must_connect: Вы должны подключиться к кошельку чтобы получить доступ к продукту
